mapper.update: update tb_agent a set a.commpay_name=#{commpayName}, a.person= #{person}, a.phone=#{phone}, a.province=#{province}, a.city=#{city}, a.district =#{district}, a.address =#{address}, a.trading_img=#{tradingImg}, a.add_consumer_id=#{addConsumerId}, a.add_date =#{addDate}, a.is_del=#{isDel} where a.id = #{id}
update tb_agent a set a.is_del = 1 where a.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select concat(t.id,'')as id, t.commpay_name,t.person,t.phone, y.name as provinceName ,c.name as cityName,d.name as districtName, t.address,u.nick_name as userName, t.province as provinceId,t.city as cityId,t.district as districtId, DATE_FORMAT(t.add_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as adddate,t.login_name as loginName, t.trading_img ,t.check_remark checkRemark,t.type tyep from tb_agent t left join tb_city y on t.province = y.id left join tb_city c on t.city = c.id left join tb_city d on t.district = d.id left join tb_consumer u on t.add_consumer_id = u.id where t.is_del=0 and t.type=1 and t.add_consumer_id=#{ConsumerId}

select t.id id, t.commpay_name,t.person,t.phone, t.address, DATE_FORMAT(t.add_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as adddate, t.trading_img from tb_agent t where t.is_del=0
and t.commpay_name like "%"#{param.commpayName}"%"
and t.person like "%"#{param.person}"%"

select t.id as id, t.commpay_name as commpayName,t.person,t.phone, y.name as provinceName ,c.name as cityName,d.name as districtName, t.address,u.nick_name as userName, DATE_FORMAT(t.add_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as adddate, t.trading_img as tradingImg,t.add_consumer_id as addConsumerId from tb_agent t left join tb_city y on t.province = y.id left join tb_city c on t.city = c.id left join tb_city d on t.district = d.id left join tb_consumer u on t.add_consumer_id = u.id where t.is_del=0 and l.is_del=0 and t.id =#{id}
mapper.update: update tb_agent a set a.channel_id=#{channelId} where a.id = #{ids}
mapper.select: select t.add_consumer_id, t.id, t.commpay_name,t.person,t.phone, y.name as provinceName ,c.name as cityName,d.name as districtName, t.address,u.nick_name as userName, DATE_FORMAT(t.add_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as adddate, t.trading_img ,t.type tyep from tb_agent t left join tb_city y on t.province = y.id left join tb_city c on t.city = c.id left join tb_city d on t.district = d.id left join tb_consumer u on t.add_consumer_id = u.id where t.is_del=0 and t.type=2 and t.add_consumer_id=#{ConsumerId}

select a.id id,a.commpay_name label,ca.channel_id channelId from tb_agent a left join tb_corp_agent ca on ca.agent_id=a.id where a.commpay_name like "%"#{param.commpayName}"%" and ca.corp_id=#{corpId} and ca.`status`=2 and a.is_del=0
